name: Cape Scott and The North Coast Trail Guide
categories: Cape Scott and The North Coast Trail Guide
description: Unlock the secrets of northern Vancouver Island with this comprehensive guidebook about Cape Scott and the North Coast Trail. Illustrated with maps and vivid photographs, and loaded with details about biology, human history and the dramatic Pacific Northwest geography, this guide is perfect for day trippers, serious backpackers or anyone wanting to learn more about the culture and wildlife of the region.
